Class JDBCUsersAndGroupsStore

java.lang.Object
  fr.cnes.sitools.security.JDBCUsersAndGroupsStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
UsersAndGroupsStore
public final class JDBCUsersAndGroupsStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements UsersAndGroupsStore

Implementation of UsersAndGroupsStore with SQL JDBC Persistence [3317773]
21/06/2011 m.gond {Use of a transaction when creating and updating a user so that if there is an error the modifications aren't executed}

Author:
jp.boignard (AKKA Technologies)

updateUser

public User updateUser(User bean)
                throws SitoolsException
Important : Password is modified only if it is not null and different from "". otherwise it is unchanged. A user cannot have a password null or "".

Specified by:
